participant_1.background:
I remember summers spent playing in the creek with my friends.
My dream is to travel the world and take pictures of my journey.
I like to take my charges hiking in the Appalachian trail.
I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.

participant_2.background:
I am a hard worker who is passionate about my job
i eat all take out.
i have a marketing job.
i have always had long hair.
my hobbies include reading and cycling.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
Just working! What are you up to?
Today is my day off! I'm going hiking with some friends in the Appalachian Trail.
That sounds amazing! I love hiking too. I've never hiked the Appalachian Trail, but I've hiked in the mountains in Colorado.
I've always wanted to go to Colorado! It's so beautiful there.
It is! The mountains are amazing, and the air is so fresh.
I love taking pictures of my hikes. I've got a whole album of pictures of my hikes on my phone.
I love taking pictures too! I've got a whole camera bag full of cameras and lenses.
Wow, you must be really into photography!
I am! It's one of my favorite hobbies.
What's your favorite thing about photography?
I love capturing the beauty of the world around me. I also love the challenge of taking good pictures.
I agree! Capturing the beauty of the world is amazing. I also love the challenge of taking good pictures.
